store-body.description: HTTP body defining the store operation for the /store endpoint.

timeStamp.description: The timestamp in the following format - "2006-01-02 15:04:05".

token.description: A crypto token to validate if the entity is allowed to perform the requested operation.

availability.description: The percentage availability of the cloud member resources for a billing cycle.

responseTime.description: Exact time (seconds) between stimulus to the cloud service and corresponding service's response. The percentage a service manages to respond within the defined response time limit for a billing cycle.

CPUPower.description: Max. no. of processing power (Hertz) provided by CSP to customer to process his data.

diskSpace.description: Max. no. of available space (PetaBytes) provided by CSP to customer to store his data.

memorySize.description: Max. no. of information (GigaBytes) the cloud service is able to hold for the customer to read/write his data.

bandwidth.description: Amount of outbound data transfers (GigaByte/month), customers will be given the ability to customize the cloud services, and corresponding SLAs, according to the demand and usage of the services.

throughput.description: Min. no. of requests that can be processed by the cloud service in a stated time period (GigaBytes/sec).

elasticity.description: Quickly de/provision resources, dynamically adjust the amount of resources allocated to an instance of a service (seconds to react).

read-body.description: HTTP body defining the read operation for the /read endpoint.

token.description: A crypto token to validate if the entity is allowed to perform the requested operation.

index.description: Index of the requested data as provided during the store operation.

store-response.description: HTTP response for a successful store operation.
